org.eclipse.xtend.lib.macro

Interface CodeGenerationContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    FileLocations, FileSystemSupport, MutableFileSystemSupport

    @Beta
public interface CodeGenerationContext
extends MutableFileSystemSupport, FileLocations
    Provides services for the code generation phase.
    Author:
    Sven Efftinge
    See Also:
    CodeGenerationParticipant
